title: 2  aṅga
text:
2.3 examples
 samyak samādhiḥ vaiśeṣika guṇ ^āvaraṇa viśodhan ^āṅgaṃ [abhidharmasamuccaya, 33] lakṣaṇato apy aṅga vibhāgato api aṅga samāsato apy aṅga pratyayatva vyavasthānato api aṅga karma vyava sthānato api [abhidharmasamuccaya, 25] cittotpādo avavādaś ca nirvedh ^āṅgaṃ catur vidham ādhāraḥ pratipatteś ca dharmadhātu svabhāvakaḥ [abhisamayAlaMkAra, 1.5] tasyāṃ rāja dhānyāṃ brāhmaṇo veda ved ^āṅga pārago rājño agrāsanikaḥ [avadAnazataka, vaidya48] an apar ^ādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhāny anubhūtāni a sakṛn narakeṣv a sakṛt tirya kṣva sakṛd yamaloke a sakṛn manuṣya lokeṣu hasta cchedāḥ pāda cchedāḥ karṇa cchedā karṇanās ācchedā aṅga pratyaṅga cchedās tathā n yāni vividhāni bahūni duḥkhany anubhūtāni [divyAvadAna, 308009] kālasūtrasmiṃ narake ārdra vṛkṣe vavarjitāḥ sūtrayitvāna āṅgā vā sīhi paraśūhi ca [mahAvastu, 1.12] hari candana lipt ^āṃgā kāśik ^ottama dhāriṇaḥ tāṃ deva saṃghāṃ pariṣāṃ samāgatāṃ śuciṃ sujātāṃ śata puṇya lakṣaṇāṃ [mahAvastu, 1.296] niśray ^āṅgaṃ svabhāv ^āṅgaṃ niryāṇ ^āṅgaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ caturtham anuśaṃs ^āṅgam a kleś ^āṅgaṃ tray ^ātmakam [mahAyAnasUtrAlaMkAra, 145] ananta viśeṣaṇa saṃbhave api pratītyasamutpādasya aṣṭānām ev opādānam eṣāṃ prādhānyena vivād ^āṅga bhūtatvāt [prasannapadA, 4] veda ved ^āṅga viduṣas tasthuṣaḥ ṣaṭsu karmasu śāntaye vṛddhaye c ^aiva yatra viprān a jīt japan [saundarananda, 1.43] kim aṅga punar yaḥ śatadh ābhinnayā vāl ^āgra koṭ yābhy utkṣipta eka udaka binduḥ [sukhAvatIvyUhaLargerSUtra, 29] māṃsaṃ māṃs ^ārthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇit ^ārthikebhyo majjānaṃ majj ^ārthikebhyo aṅga pratyaṅgāny aṅga pratyaṅg ^ārthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śiror t hikebhyaḥ parity akṣyāmi [zikSAsamuccaya, 21] daśabhir a śaikṣair aṅgaiḥ pañcānām a śaikṣāṇāṃ skandhānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ [zrAvakabhUmi, śbhī-304]

title: 3  ālaya
text:
3.3 examples
 evaṃ caranti ye lokā ahorātra vrataṃ mudā te sarva pāpa nirmuktāḥ saṃpray ^āyur jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 135] yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā saṃsthāpya svavaśe jagat saṃbuddha śaraṇaṃ gatvā prānte yāyāṃ jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 185] tathā sarve api te nāgā yāvaj jīvaṃ mahat sukham bhuktvā puṇy ^ānubhāvaiś ca prānte yayur jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 194] tatas tau dampatī c ^āpi yāvaj jīvaṃ jin ^ārcanam kṛtvā saukhyaṃ prabhuktvānte saṃj agmāte jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 346] etat puṇy ^ānubhāvais te sarvatra man galaṃ bhavet sarvadā sat sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāyāś c ^ānte jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 352] etat puṇy ^ānubhāvena n ^aiva gacchanti durgatim sarvadā sa śubhaṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yānti jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 42] an avabodhād bālānāṃ bhūmi kram ^ānusaṃdhi vyapadeśaṃ traidhātuka vicitr ^opacāraś ca vyavasthāpyate buddha dharm ^ālayā ca [laGkAvatArasUtra, 86] udadheḥ pariṇāmo asau taraṃgāṇāṃ vicitratā ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñān ^ākhyaṃ pravartate [laGkAvatArasUtra, 132] cittaṃ vikalpo vijñaptir mano vijñānam eva ca ālayaṃ tribhavaś ceṣṭā ete cittasya paryayāḥ [laGkAvatArasUtra, 137] yena parikalpita svabhāva gati prabhedena su prativibhāga viddhena pudgala dharma nairātmya pracāraṃ prativiśodhya bhūmiṣu kṛta vidyāḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha tīrthakara dhyāna samādhi samāpatti sukham atikramya tathāgat ā cintya viṣaya pracāra gati pracāraṃ pañcadharma svabhāva gati vinivṛttaṃ tathāgataṃ dharmakāyaṃ prajñā jñāna suni baddha dharmaṃ māyā viṣay ^ābhinivṛttaṃ sarva buddha kṣetra tuṣita bhavan kaniṣṭh ^ālay ^opagaṃ tathāgata kāyaṃ pratilabheran [laGkAvatArasUtra, 23] ye an eka paryāyeṇa kāma rāgaṃ kāmacchandaṃ kām ^ālayaṃ kāma niyantiṃ kām ^ādhyavasānaṃ vigarhanti vivarṇayanti vijugupsayanti [zrAvakabhUmi, śbhi-154]

title: 4  āsana
text:
4.3 examples
 iyaṃ hi satata syūtā saṃtata prīti tantubhiḥ n āpaiti sarva jantūnāṃ prāg janm ^ābhyāsav ^āsanā [avadAnakalpalatA, 2.33] atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāst dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥ saṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā āsanena vā upanimantrayiṣyati [avadAnazataka, vaidya8] paṃca bhikṣu śatāni dhyāna lābhīny utthāy ^āsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dharma deśanāṃ n āvataranto n āvagāha mānāḥ an adhimucamānāḥ ath ^āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat imāni bhagavāṃ paṃca bhikṣuṣatāni dhyāna lābhīny utthāy ^āsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni [kAzyapaparivarta, 69v] so ca ratha vicitro maṇḍitaḥ pārthivena api ca maru sahasrair divya siṃh ^āsanebhiḥ caturi ratana vṛkṣā patra puṣp ^opapetā abhinadita manojñāṃ haṃsa krauñcān mayūrān [lalitavistara, 60] api tu putra rāhula pravrājikena bhūmyāṃ tṛṇa saṃstarike śayitavyaṃ vṛkṣa mūle śeyy ^āsanaṃ caṇḍāla pukkasa kulāni piṇḍāya agantavyaṃ kruḍ ḍha prasannānāṃ mukhaṃ nir īkṣitavyaṃ api śvasamānaṃ pi ucchiṣṭaṃ bhojanaṃ bhoktavyaṃ [mahAvastu, 3.264] atha bhagavāṃ yaṃ kālaṃ bhukto dhauta pāṇir apanīta pātro bhikṣu saṃgho ca tataḥ bhagavatā rājā śuddhodano mahāprajāpatī gautamī yaśodharā ca rāhulamātā saparivārā dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpra harṣayitvā utthāy ^āsanāto prakrāmi [mahAvastu, 3.272] anye devā ṣaṭ ṭālam uccatven ānye devā paṃca tālaṃ anye devā catu tālaṃ anye devā tritālaṃ anye devā dvitālaṃ anye devā tāla mātraṃ bodhivṛkṣasya mūle siṃh ^āsanam [mahAvastu, 2.313] yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghikaṃ śayy ^āsanaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā vā kurcaṃ vā abhyavakāśe prajñapya tataḥ prakramet n oddharet n oddh ā rayed vā pātayantikā [prAtimokSasUtra_sarvAstivAda, prmosūpāt.13] te c ^ā prameyā asaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anya lokadhātv āgatā ratnavṛkṣa mūleṣu siṃh ^āsan ^opaviṣṭāḥ [saddharmapuNDarIka, 269] upāya kauśalya jñānen ādīpta jīrṇa paṭala śaraṇa niveśana sadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣk ^āsana hetos trīṇi yānāny upadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddha yānaṃ bodhisattvayānam iti [saddharmapuNDarIka, 54] ity atha sthavir ^ānandas tāṃ sa rājikāṃ parṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samutt ^ejya saṃgraharṣya tair devatā śatasahasrair an ekaiś ca rājagṛha vāsibhiḥ prāṇi śatasahasrair namasyamāna utthāy ^āsanāt prakrāntaḥ [suvarNavarNAvadAna, 345.1—346.3]

title: 5  bandha
text:
5.3 examples
 āryaṃ c ^ādyaṃ ādyaṃ sāmanta kaman ^āgamyaṃ tac chuddhakaṃ c ^ān āsravaṃ ca yady api sāmantaka cittena pratisaṃdhi bandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati [abhidharmakozabhASya, 448.01.448.02] śloka bandh ^ānuguṇyataḥ [abhidharmakozabhASya, 128.10] tataḥ śākunikair nyastāḥ pāśa bandhāḥ pade pade prabhāvād barhi rājasy īryant ^aiva saṃtatam [avadAnakalpalatA, 8.51] paṭṭa dānaṃ dadāti deva manuṣy ^ābhiṣeka paṭṭa bandha vipāka pratilābha saṃvartanīyam [divyAvadAna, 426021] āpattim āpanna na cchādayanti vivaranti ca eti doṣān dhana rājya heto na ca jīvit ^ārthaṃ mṛṣā vadante saṃjñām ākrośan ā kutsana paṃsanāsu vadheṣu bandheṣv avarodhaneṣu [kAzyapaparivarta, 8v] pratitarjenti rājāno bandhena ca vadhena ca tas māsya varṇaṃ bhāṣāmi rakṣaṃ jīvitam ātmano [mahAvastu, 3.14] te dāni tāṃ maṃjūṣām ādāya rājño brahmadattasya upasaṃkrāntā mahārāja asmābhir nadyāṃ gaṃgāyāṃ matsyān bandhantehi iyaṃ maṃjuṣā udakena utkṣiptā rāja mudrāye mudritā tāṃ devo pratyavekṣatu [mahAvastu, 3.166] mitra bandhaṃ ca kuryāsi pāṭirājehi pārthiva dṛḍha mitrāṃ hi rājāno pūjenti aparā prajā [mahAvastu, 1.276] yadi mama upavāsa kocid hareya vā bandheya vā na tasya kenacid a priyo vā viprayo vā kartavyo [mahAvastu, 2.178] atha syāt a baddhasya mokṣ ā saṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamane baddhatvān mucyamānatvāc ca yaugapadyena bandha mokṣaṇe syātām [prasannapadA, 128] ayaṃ prajñayā saṃgṛhīta upāyo bandhaḥ [vimalakIrtinirdeza, 4.17] dhyān ^ābhijña vimokṣasu śikṣita kasya na toṣayi carya vidhi jñaḥ rāhu yath ^eṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade tala bandhaṃ [zikSAsamuccaya, 346]

title: 6  bhojana
text:
6.3 examples
 pratikṣiptāc ca buddhena yad api na prakṛtyā dauḥ śīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptam a kāla bhojan ^ādikaṃ tasmād api dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam [abhidharmakozabhASya, 273.07] upasṛtya sa bhū pālaṃ kṛśo vikṛta vigrahaḥ kṣuptipās ārdito asmi iti yayāce pāna bhojanam [avadAnakalpalatA, 3.57] vikāla bhojanaṃ [bhikSuNIvinaya, 27] ito ahaṃ kulaputra eka piṭharikāyā nān ^ādhimuktān sattvān yath ^ābhipreta bhojanaiḥ saṃtarpayāmi nānā sūpair nānā rasair nānā varṇair nānā gandhaiḥ [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 106] vyādhi praśāntāṃś ca su snāt ^ānulipta gātrān kṛtvā yathārh ^ābharaṇa vibhūṣitāṅgān yathārha vastra saṃchādita śarīrān vividha bhojana rasāgraiḥ saṃtarpya a parimita dhana samṛddhān karomi [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 117] yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojan ^āgryam tatha bodhisattva ima pāramitāṃ labhitvā arhanta bhūmita gaveṣayiṣyanti bodhim [ratnaguNasaMcayagAthA, 11.4] atha bhagavāṃ bhadra rājāya devaputrāya sādhukāram a dāt sādhu sādhu devaputra su bhāṣitas tvayā yam upamopanyāsa nirdeśo bodhisatvānāṃ api tu khalu punar devaputra yāvantas tṛṇa vanaspatayo yāvanto nāma saṃketāḥ śabde saṃketāḥ yāvanto ruta saṃketāḥ yāvanto satvānāṃ citta carita praveśā yāvatī nāma rūpa prabhāvanā yāvantaḥ satvānām vicārāḥ yāvantaḥ satvānāṃ paribhogāḥ pāna bhojanāni devaputra dhāraṇī pratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya ^upamopanyāsa nirdeśāḥ na khalu punar devaputra dhāraṇī pratilabdasya bodhisatvasya kiṃcid vacanaṃ yan na buddhavaca na sa kaś cid rūp ^āvabhāso vā śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharm ^āvabhāso vā yas tasya na pratibhāti [tathAgatAcintyaguhya, 3v] māse māse kuśāgreṇa yo hi bhuñjīta bhojanam na tat sv ākhyāta dharmasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm [udAnavarga, 2420d] evam eva bhadant ^ānanda tāvad eva tad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhavati yāvat sarva kleśa viṣaṃ na nir viṣaṃ bhavati [vimalakIrtinirdeza, 10.7] tatra viṣama bhojanaṃ yad atyalpam ati prabhūtaṃ ca a pariṇate vā a pathyaṃ vā saṃkliṣṭaṃ vā paribhuṅkte [zrAvakabhUmi, śbhi-144] ati prabhūta bhojana parivarjanāc ca yen ^āsya na gurukaḥ kāyo bhavaty a karmaṇyaḥ a prahāṇa kṣama iti vistareṇa pūrvavat [zrAvakabhUmi, śbhi-148]

title: 7  bhuj
text:
7.3 examples
 yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā saṃsthāpya svavaśe jagat saṃbuddha śaraṇaṃ gatvā prānte yāyāṃ jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 185] yad bhogyaṃ no gṛhe n ^āsty etad eva hi jīvanam tat kiṃ sā jananī bhuñjyād vin ^āhāraṃ na jīvati [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 247] etat puṇy ^ānubhāvais te sarvatra man galaṃ bhavet sarvadā sat sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāyāś c ^ānte jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 352] etat puṇy ^ānubhāvena n ^aiva gacchanti durgatim sarvadā sa śubhaṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yānti jin ^ālayam [ahorAtravratacaityasevAnuzaMsAvadAna, 42] a lābūnāṃ eṣāṃ cchinā śākhā prarohate a pakṣa lūnāṃ bhuṃjate pūrva dānasya tat phalam [AyuHparyantasUtra, 11] atha śreṣṭhī brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā candraprabhasya dārakasya catasro dhātrīr anuprayacchati aṅkadhātrī maladhātrī stanadhātrī dhātrī [divyAvadAna, 310004] nidhi dṛṣṭa yathā hi palāyati ko ci naro dhana saukhyam a jānaku mūḍha mano tvam api tath ^aiva hi rāgam a jānanako yaḥ svayam āgatikāṃ na hi bhuñjasi kāminikām [lalitavistara, 235] ambe yo kocit samyagvadamāno vade so su kumāro parama suku māro titat so yo me pitā na so bhūmyāṃ tṛṇa saṃstarike śayati vṛkṣa mūle śayy ^āsanaṃ ākalpayati kulākuleṣu piṇḍāya carati ucchiṣṭāni bhojanāni bhuṃjati araṇy ^āyatane viharati na so pi nāma evaṃ su kumāro evaṃ sukh ^ocito ten ^āpi abhisaṃbhuṇitaṃ tad vayaṃ n ^ābhi bhuṇiṣyāmaḥ [mahAvastu, 3.264] yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīya bhojanīyaṃ khāded vā bhuṃjīta vā pātayantikā [prAtimokSasUtra_sarvAstivAda, prmosūpāt.37] āry ^ānanda mayā buddha pramukho bhikṣu saṃgho antar g gṛhe ṣaḍ rasen āhāreṇa bhojayitvā ekaiko bhikṣuḥ śatasahasrakeṇa cīvareṇ ācchādayitavya iti vicintitaṃ sa ca bhagavān parinirvṛtas tad icchāmy nanda pramukhaṃ bhikṣu saṃgham adhunā bhojayitum iti [suvarNavarNAvadAna, 336.5—339.3]

title: 8  cakra
text:
8.3 examples
 brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati a pravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇ ^eti [arthavinizcayasUtra, 325] tato abhyantaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ tatr ^āsya dvāraṃ pi hitam tato abhyantaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ yāvat puruṣaṃ paśyati mahā pramāṇam mūrdhni c ^āsya ayomayaṃ cakraṃ bhramaty ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam eka jvālī bhūtam [avadAnazataka, vaidya91] srag dāma śaṃkha kalaśa svastika bhadr ^āsan ^āṅkuśa dhvaja cakraiḥ cihnaiḥ khacit a śarīraṃ sara iva sūry ^āṃśu jāla bhinnaiḥ padmaiḥ [buddhist_stotras, 15] rudraṃ n ^aika kapāla śekhara dharaṃ cakr ^āyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ giri sutā putraṃ mayūr ^āsanam [divyAvadAna, 493029] sādho prāsk halayaṃ śiraḥ praharaṇaṃ pādena pāp ^āśayas ten edaṃ jvalit ā nalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhram atyāya sam [divyAvadAna, 509009] prabhinna cakr ^āgra vibhinna mūrdhnā airāvaṇasy tan patantī [divyAvadAna, 509034] kṛtvā duś caritaṃ sva mātari jagat kṛtsnam yadi prodvahed etat prajvalit āgni rāga kapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhan mūrdhani [divyAvadAna, 511024] atha tasya sarva sattva priyasya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya vacanān antaram eva mūrdhnā samutpāṭy ^otkṣiptam iva tac cakraṃ saptatāl occhrayāc cakraṃ nabhas talaṃ samutpat yāvat a sthe [divyAvadAna, 511028] tena cakra varti rāja bhūtena tasya bhagavato dharmacakra nirghoṣa gagana megha pradīpa rājasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasy ^ān antaraṃ dharma gagan ^ābhyudgat aśrīr ā jo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 278] evaṃ lokadhātu nayeṣu lokadhātu cakreṣu lokadhātu maṇḍaleṣu lokadhātu vibhāgeṣu lokadhātu nadīṣu lokadhātv āvarteṣu lokadhātu parivarteṣu lokadhātu sumeruṣu lokadhātu samudgateṣu lokadhātu padmeṣu lokadhātu vṛkṣeṣu loka dhātu khārakeṣu lokadhātu saṃjñā gateṣv api prajānāmi [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 307] a sati c cakr ^ādikasya karaṇasya kartuḥ kumbhakārasya ghaṭa karaṇ akri yāyāś c ^ā bhāv ā dhayor a bhāvaḥ [prasannapadA, 219]

title: 9  candra
text:
9.3 examples
 anyatr ^aiva hi deśe ādarśa talaṃ bhavaty anyatr ^aiv āntargataṃ candra pratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa iv odakam [abhidharmakozabhASya, 121.02.121.03] jñātaya ūcuḥ yasmād asya jātau sarvalokānāṃ nayana prahlādanam tasmād bhavatu asya dārakasya candra iti nām ^eti [avadAnazataka, vaidya131] ataḥ supuṣpa candreṇa jāna tāpi nṛp ^āpadam ātma duḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt [bodhicaryAvatAra, 8.105] nirvānt ā mala hema śaila śirasaḥ praccheda gaura dyutiḥ saṃpūrṇ ā mala candram aṇḍa lasa macchatror ubh ā svacchir [divyAvadAna, 494029] tasy ^ān antaraṃ dharm ^olk ā jvalana śrī candro nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 237] vāme vātajavo n ^ā māha javen ahaṃ candra ravī graseyaṃ prav ^āyam gagane ca vāyum [lalitavistara, 228] śakyā kartuṃ candr ^ādityau tama timira vitimira karau na bho adya mahī talaṃ śakyo n āhaṃ tvat sādṛśyair bahubhir api gaṇana virutair drumāt prat c ^ā litum [lalitavistara, 245] pratīti nirākṛto yathā a candraḥ śaśī iti [nyAyabiNDu, 0000] ācārya candra kīrti viracitayā prasann apad ^ākhya vyākhyayā saṃvalitam [prasannapadA, 1] api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante tasminn eva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulā daṇḍonnā bhāvanām avat candra bimba pratibimbavat [prasannapadA, 248] pradīpa vidyun maṇi candra bhāskarān pratītya paśyanti yathā sacakṣuṣaḥ mah ^ārtha dharma pratibhā prabhākaraṃ muniṃ pratīty ^edamu dāhṛtaṃ tathā [ratnagotravibhAga, 117] darśayi kāya vikurvā cintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitaiṣī candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarva diśi pratibhāsaṃ [zikSAsamuccaya, 345]

title: 10  caraṇa
text:
10.3 examples
 atha jetavanaṃ prāpya kṣaṇena kusum ^āvalī sā bhakti śālinī śāstuḥ papāta caraṇ ^ābjayoḥ [avadAnakalpalatA, 93.41] śrutaṃ bho ānanda purāṇānāṃ parivrājakānām antikāj jīrṇānāṃ buddhānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahatāṃ caraṇ ^ācāryāṇām kadācit karhi cit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante tadyathā udumbaraṃ puṣpam [avadAnazataka, vaidya102] avanamya tataḥ pralamba hārā caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jāta harṣā parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ sura lok ^ābhimukhī divaṃ agāma [avadAnazataka, vaidya141] tasya mātā janetrī tac chrutvā udvignā strī sahasra parivṛtā pramukta keśī nir ābharaṇa gātrī sva mukhaṃ vyāl upya uras tāḍayantī pāṃśv avakīrṇa śiraskā krandamānā ārta svaraṃ rudantī rājānaṃ upasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayor nipatya evaṃ vijñāpayām āsa pramuñca deva vijitāvinaṃ rāja kumāram [gaNDavyUhasUtra, 274] asti kulaputra pūrva dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ito buddha kṣetra koṭī śatasahasra gaṅgā nadī vālukā samān buddha kṣetr ^ān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātur nānā guṇa vibhūṣitā nānā puṣpa samīritā nānā gandhaiś ca sphuṭā ratnavṛkṣair alaṅkṛtā ratna parvatair ākīrṇā nīla vaiḍūrya mayī tatra bhūmir bodhisattvair ākīrṇā dharma śabdena sphuṭā sā ca punar vaiḍūrya mayī bhūmir mṛdu kācalindika sukhasaṃsparśa nikṣipte ca caraṇe catur aṅgulama vana mati utkṣipte ca caraṇe catur aṅgula munna mati nānā padmaiś c ^ākīrṇā [karuNApuNDarIkasUtra, 7] pratyutthāya tataḥ kṛt ^āñjali puṭo caraṇāni so vandate aṅke gṛhya mahātma śāstra kuśalo nidhyāyato prekṣate so apaśya dvara lakṣaṇaiḥ kavacitaṃ nārāyaṇa sthāmavaṃ śīrṣaṃ kampya sa veda śāstra kuśalo dve tasya paśyad gatī [lalitavistara, 78] ye c ^eha trisāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau śakro vā brahmā vā loka pālā vā tad anye vā maheśākhya maheśākhyā devaputrās te api sarve tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ śirobhiḥ praṇipatya tathāgatam adhyeṣante sma dharmacakra pravartanāya pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram [lalitavistara, 300] dīrgh ^āṃgulī tāmra nakhā jālehi utsa dehi ca caraṇā lokanāthānāṃ vrajatāṃ citra medinīṃ [mahAvastu, 2.304] ity arhataḥ parama kāruṇikasya śāstur mūrdhnā vacaś ca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā sva sthaḥ praśānta hṛdayo vinivṛtta kāryaḥ pārśvān muneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva [saundarananda, 18.60] paśya śāntamate tathāgata kāya māh ^ātmyaṃ yatra hi nāma gurutvena ca vajra sadṛśo mṛdutvena ca kācalindika sukhasaṃsparśaḥ bhavati ca śāntamate sakālaḥ sa samayo yadā mahaujaska mahaujaskā deva putrā apsara saś ca tathāgatasya caraṇo vandamānā a spṛṣṭa pūrvvaṃ sparśaṃ spṛṣṭvā anutt ā rāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayanti na c ^eṣāṃ kleś ^otpattir bhavati [tathAgatAcintyaguhya, 4r] evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyu śalyen āpagata mad asyā parāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu māṃsa śoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe paritapta tṛṣita vihvala vadanasya kara caraṇa vikṣep ^ābhiyuktasya ^a karmaṇyasya ^a samarthasya lālā siṅghāṇa kapūya mūtra purīṣ ^opaliptasya jīvit ^āvaśeṣasya karma bhavāt punar bhavam ālambānasya yama puruṣa bhaya bhītasya aśagatasya caram ^āśvāsapraśvāseṣ ^ūparudhyamāneṣu kākino a dvitīyasya ^a sahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ para lokam ākrāmato mah ^āpathaṃ vrajato mahā kāntāraṃ praviśato mahā gahanaṃ samavag ^āha mānasya mah ^āndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya mah ^ārṇavenorjya mānasya karma vāyunā hriyamāṇasy ānimittī kṛtāṃ diśaṃ gacchato n ānyat trāṇaṃ n ānyac charaṇaṃ n ānyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt [zikSAsamuccaya, 207]

title: 11  dhātu
text:
11.3 examples
 catur vijñāna c ^āhāra catuṣka vacanād rūp ^ārupya dhāt vor api kavaḍī kār ^āhāra prasaṅgaḥ [abhidharmakozabhASya, 435.05.435.06] kasmin dhātau mriyamāṇaḥ nirodhayati iti nirodha yaty uparamān n ārūpye jīvitam manaḥ [abhidharmakozabhASya, 048.15] yaś ca ākāśa dhātuḥ [aSTasAhasrikA, 253] oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni priyeṇa kṛtāni karmāṇy upacitāni ko anyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivī dhātau vipacyante n ^āb dhātau na tejo dhātau na vāyu dhātau api t ^ūpātteṣv eva skandha dhātv āyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny a śubhāni ca [avadAnazataka, vaidya163] tato asya bhagavatā āśay ^ānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharma deśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutv ^opapādukena bhikṣuṇā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāra cakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarva saṃskāra gatīḥ śatana patana vikiraṇa vidhvaṃsana dharmatayā parā hatya sarva kleśa prahāṇād arhat vaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam [avadAnazataka, vaidya216] anupūrveṇa yāvat bodhi pratiṣṭhāpan ^ārthaṃ laukika vyavahār ^ānukūlatayā dāridrya nāś ^opāyatayā dhātu vaiṣamya manuṣy ā manuṣy ^opasaṃhṛt ^opadrava praśamanatayā an avadya krīḍā rati vastu ūpasaṃhārato dharmarati vyāvartanatayā sanniv ā sopakaraṇ ^ārthinām alpa kṛcchreṇa sanniv ā sopakaraṇ ^opasaṃharaṇatayā rāja caur ^ādy upadrava paritrāṇatayā sthān ā sthāna prayog ^ānujñā pratiṣedhanatayā maṅgalyā maṅgalya vastv ādānat yāga sanniyojanatayā dṛṣṭe dharme paraspar ^ānabhidroha samparāy ā viparīt ^ābhyudaya mārg ^opadeśanatayā [bodhisattvabhUmi, 233] ārupya dhātu samatikrāntatvāt sarvaloka viṣaya samatikrānta ity ucyate [lalitavistara, 310] a mukaṃ kālaṃ maye adhimātraṃ kṣudrapākāni phalāni parimuktāni bahutarakaṃ ca me pānīyaṃ pītaṃ tato me abhiṣyaṇṇehi dhātūhi apala kuṇḍake sa śukraṃ prasrāvaṃ kṛtaṃ [mahAvastu, 3.144] vyayo api śūnyaḥ tiṣṭhann api so ab dhātuḥ svabhāva śūny ^eti hi mahā rāj ^ābdhā tur ab dhātutven opalabhyate anyatra vyavahāra mātrāt [zikSAsamuccaya, 247] evaṃ pariśuddhe citte paryavadāte an aṃgaṇe vigat ^opakleśe ṛju bhūte karmaṇye sthite āniṃjya prāpte sacet catvāry āryasatyāny ārabhya teṣāṃ parijñāyai prahāṇāya sākṣātkriyāyai bhāvanāyai parato ghoṣam avavād ^ānuśāsanīṃ labhate evam asau bhavyo bhavati pratibalaś ca yoga vihitasya manaskārasya ^utpādanāya tat pūrvikāyāś ca samyag dṛṣṭeḥ catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamāgacchati ca paripūrayati nirupadhiśeṣe ca nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvāti [zrAvakabhUmi, śbhi-22]
